text: George Caleb Bingham (March 20, 1811 - July 7, 1879) was an American artist. His paintings of American life in the frontier lands along the Missouri River are good examples of the Luminist style. Bingham was little-known in his time. His work was rediscovered in the 1930s. By 2011, he was considered one of the greatest American painters of the 19th century. ==Related pages== *DÃ¼sseldorf school of painting *List of American painters ==References== * George Caleb Bingham Category:American painters Category:People from Missouri Category:People from Virginia Category:1811 births Category:1879 deaths
title: George Caleb Bingham
